alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 9:04PM EST until March 02 at 10:21PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. .Recent heavy rainfall will continue to cause rises on the Green River into the weekend, with expected crests late in the weekend or early next week. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 384.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 385.8 feet this Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
